extends Human

    Jason (darkdiplomat)

      • despawn

        NonPlayableCharacter despawn()
        De-spawn the NPC and return its reference for further processing. This does not DELETE this entity, it stays there, its just no longer shown
        Returns:
        the NonPlayableCharacter instance

      • getRegisteredListener

        NPCBehaviorListener getRegisteredListener(java.lang.Class<? extends NPCBehaviorListener> clazz)
        Gets the NPCBehaviorListener for this NonPlayableCharacter of the given class type.
        Returns:
        the NPCBehaviorListener or null if one of this type is not Registered to this NPC.
